data.text: #DidYouKnow that we're proudly carrying our well-recognizable livery with the lime-green tail and name "Baltic" on it for 16 years? It was introduced on October 2004 and has been updated few times since then. https://t.co/Ppg6aw73zP

Get ready to polish your skis and explore winter wonderland as we are adding new and exciting destination to our winter schedule - Kittilä in Finland! Book your travel ✈️ https://t.co/wQMnzzp7UZ and check travel restrictions before it 👉 https://t.co/67jWDQXz0Y https://t.co/swooqYlNPJ

data.text:
✈️ Here's our #HowItStarted #HowItsGoing - 1995 vs 2020.

From twin-engine turboprop with just 33 seats to proud carrier operating only world’s greenest commercial aircraft @Airbus A220-300 😎 https://t.co/041PzAwzoA

Good morning! ☀️ Thanks to all the participants! More than three quarters of you got it right - currently airBaltic perform its flights to/from Berlin-Tegel Airport (TXL). See you in the remaining flights there! ✈️

Weekend is almost here meaning it's time for new #airBalticQuiz! 💡
airBaltic is planning to start its operations to the new Berlin Brandenburg Airport on November 8th. However, do you know to which airport in Berlin we are performing flights right now? ✈️

Flight attendant uniforms focus on comfort and safety, but they’re also a very important element of an airline’s identity. #DidYouKnow that since founding in 1995 airBaltic has had 7 styles of uniform designs? Here are some of them! https://t.co/DZZmzNMbAN

As of today all passengers must fill an online questionnaire before their arrival to Latvia at https://t.co/X5OjjXCC96
It is mandatory for all travellers, and must be completed no earlier than 48 hours before crossing the border of Latvia. 
More: https://t.co/M8YxZKhcm2 https://t.co/YFfCFHTA9F

No šodienas visiem pasažieriem, ierodoties Latvijā, jāaizpilda tiešsaistes anketa vietnē https://t.co/RwCIPMhWWu
Šīs anketas aizpildīšana ir obligāta – to nepieciešams veikt ne ātrāk kā 48 stundas pirms Latvijas robežas šķērsošanas.
Sīkāk: https://t.co/ewziBoOvY5 https://t.co/0eS8liCKEZ

Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! 52% of you got the right answer - the first issue of our inflight magazine Baltic Outlook was published in 1999! 😊 
Have a wonderful week! 👋

Hello Friday! 👋 It’s  #airBalticQuiz time! This week we would like to check your knowledge about our Baltic Outlook magazine! Do you know when was the first Baltic Outlook inflight magazine published? 😊📰

We are very excited to launch an internal talent leadership program airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA). The new program has been created to accelerate potential of @airBaltic professionals as future leaders of the company and industry. Read more: https://t.co/ftem3YaFH6 https://t.co/PAtm8aUAlU

Ambition, vision, energy, drive to move, go forward and never give up - @airBaltic and its CEO have many traits in common. Read the special interview with Martin Gauss @Gaussm - this month we are celebrating airline's 25th anniversary: https://t.co/IllOG7hjnj https://t.co/WBDTkqajsC

This month we are celebrating our 25th birthday! #Didyouknow that 25 years ago, on October 1, our first commercial flight was from Riga to Stockholm? It was operated with the Saab SF340 aircraft which has 33 seats. https://t.co/AmQNUQbdki

We're incredibly excited to celebrate @airBaltic 25th anniversary! 🥳️ We wanted to share the 25 years full of wonderful memories with you with a special Baltic Outlook magazine! Read it here https://t.co/14CLTVDH9k or collect your personal copy on board. https://t.co/i4E5yMANxU
Thanks for participating! 79% of you got the right answer - the registration number of an aircraft with the colors of the Latvian national flag is YL-CSL! 🇱🇻 We wish you a pleasant week!😊

It's another Friday with #airBalticQuiz! This time we will test your knowledge about our special livery! 😊 Do you know what registration number does aircraft with Latvian national flag livery have? ✈️🇱🇻

Sustainability is an integral part of our daily life and future, and it is not only about clean air - at @airBaltic, we are focusing on environmental, economic and social sustainability. Learn more in our annual sustainability report published today: https://t.co/GWW4KNSwXD https://t.co/zuOPkHHpR8

Our Information Technology department is seeking for bright minds. If you love solving challenges and a dynamic environment around you, join our team and bring your career to new heights with @airBaltic! ✈️
Check the latest vacancies: https://t.co/FC1Xs5UhJM https://t.co/UQKCU9mzTY

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

data.text: You probably have already seen our aircraft with 3 special Baltic liveries. However #DidYouKnow that each was created by 15 painters using 250 litres of primer, paint, and clearcoat? It took a total of 3000 hours to complete them. https://t.co/Cc05VuKMfs

Good morning! ☀️Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! Almost 60% got the right answer - the official start date of this year's aviation winter season is October 25! Have a wonderful week! 👋

Friday is here! It's #airBalticQuiz time!
Although there are still some warm days ahead, in aviation winter season is slowly approaching. 🏔 Do you know when it starts this year? ✈️

#DidYouKnow that NATO phonetic alphabet is the most commonly used spelling dictionary in the aviation industry? The alphabet assigns code words to all of the letters in the English alphabet so that combinations of letters can be easily understood! https://t.co/jixZY3q8oD

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

data.text: Now more convenient and environmentally friendly –  our loyalty travel programme airBaltic Club introduces digital member cards📱 Read more about out the programme and download the digital card to your mobile wallet here 👉https://t.co/Y0yuBLK769 https://t.co/xNgmwPMIEv

We are excited to welcome and congratulate the eighth group of airBaltic Pilot Academy students! These 11 students have already started their studies and in less than two years they will receive a commercial pilot licence. Read more: https://t.co/PpIjyRGN0V https://t.co/b9NWUBYurp

Thanks to everyone for participating - the vote was really close, however in the end 39% of you got the right answer - although Reykjavík may seem like the right answer, Lisbon is our most furthest route from Riga currently with distance of 3142 km! 🇵🇹 https://t.co/W8qTwDS8ck

We are happy to announce that we have accepted our 23rd @Airbus A220-300 jet, registered as YL-AAW. The green-tailed beauty flew directly from factory in Montreal and touched down in @riga_airport earlier this morning. https://t.co/xfeuxEkqWo

It's time for another amazing #airBalticQuiz on Friday! 🙃
This week we are already offering flights to 37 destinations from our hub in Riga. Can you guess which one is the most furthest of them? 🗺

In August 2020, @airBaltic has carried 137 830 passengers, while continuing to connect all three Baltic capitals to 51 destinations all across Europe. Read more about August operational statistics: https://t.co/kEaekXxUhI https://t.co/ETiieJrVfz

data.text: #DidYouKnow that back when airBaltic just had four aircraft in its disposal, they were named after the four historical regions of Latvia – Zemgale, Latgale, Vidzeme and Kurzeme. https://t.co/FLhz0H06Si

This week we are resuming flights to two cities in Croatia - Split and Dubrovnik. In total, we are offering 37 destinations from Riga. See where we are flying now👉https://t.co/VhNsyB2cXN https://t.co/Nzxnr3yoB6

data.text:
Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! A small majority with 37% got the right answer - our ticket sales on the internet was launched in 2003! 🎫
Here's an excerpt from the article published more than 17 years ago! https://t.co/ldolX2CBAe

Greetings to Friday! 👋 Let's go back in time for this week's #airBalticQuiz!
Can you guess in which year airBaltic launched its ticket sales from the company's website via internet? 🖥

“The future winners will be those who are already working on sustainability." Learn more of @airBaltic sustainable development experience by CEO @Gaussm at Riga Aviation Forum: https://t.co/elvYWCHRYI https://t.co/J221qz3YMV

#DidYouKnow that September 2020 marks already more than two years since first-ever airBaltic Training Pilot Academy training flight was performed? While in summer 2018 there were only three Diamond aircraft on Pilot Academy fleet, now there are already eight of them. https://t.co/bEVzQONKmv

Thanks for participating! Although the split was pretty even, 35% of you got the right answer - airBaltic carried its first 1 millionth passenger in 2001! 👏
Have a wonderful week! https://t.co/Zp79mxPcdV

We're happy to announce that as of today @airBaltic resumes flights between Riga and nine additional destinations. In total, we now connect Riga with 35 destinations across Europe. Read more: https://t.co/CZt7XrNIQa https://t.co/bihPgt7U86

data.text: Another Friday with #airBalticQuiz testing your knowledge about our history!📖Do you remember in which year we carried our first 1 millionth passenger?✈️

Due to widespread flight changes caused by the Coronavirus crisis, @airBaltic customer service team has been handling a significantly increased volume of inquiries. Last week we received 17 000 incoming calls or 80% more than the year before. Read more: https://t.co/t5Ai0aBkpF https://t.co/3FQkSpnpBQ

Good news for passengers traveling between the Baltics and Sweden! As of September 4th, @airBaltic will resume daily flights between Riga and Stockholm. Flights will be performed on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. Read more: https://t.co/N6qTaTIJvX https://t.co/beBZTE6tOU

Great news for passengers traveling from Vilnius! @airBaltic is ready to provide additional connectivity from all three Baltic capitals by launching new direct flights from Vilnius to Kyiv on October 6th! Read more: https://t.co/WudQhCFlly https://t.co/GH20ujca6s

#DidYouKnow that average aircraft tire service life is about 500 landings? After that the wheel is removed from the aircraft for a tire change and testing done by a specialized wheel workshop technicians. 🔧 https://t.co/134Zk8Fs84

Starting September 2, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights between Tallinn and Copenhagen in Denmark offering convenient and safe travel opportunities between the two cities. Flights will be performed four times a week on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. https://t.co/nw1K5b5RN0

data.text:
With Friday comes another #airBalticQuiz! However this time we will do it a bit differently - without multiple choices! 
Next week we will add to our route map a new direct destination from Vilnius! Can you guess it? 🤔✈️ https://t.co/21wWyIQreZ

airBaltic has maintained full gender equality in the number of employees within the company. #DidYouKnow that currently 47% of the workforce within the company are female including more than 40% of airBaltic top management representatives. https://t.co/mKfoxs9iND

As a result of the Coronavirus crisis, revenue and the number of passengers carried by @airBaltic has significantly decreased. According to the financial results for the first six months of 2020, the group suffered loss of EUR 184.8 million. Read more: https://t.co/sDhtqdlEQV https://t.co/TEs9n6LgCg

As of August 26, @airBaltic resumes direct flights between Vilnius and Munich offering convenient and safe travel opportunities between the two cities. Flights will be performed two times a week on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. https://t.co/6oeANZ0Y2c

Good morning! Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! After a very tight voting 42% of you got the right answer in the end - the flyover was done at 60 metre height!
Have a wonderful week! 👋 https://t.co/4qpTBj7Bx3 https://t.co/uZxNmjqnQC

Another Friday and another #airBalticQuiz testing your mind, knowledge and sometimes luck! 💡
Last Saturday airBaltic performed a special low pass over Spilve Airport. Can you guess the lowest height at which the flyover was done? ✈️

Our travel loyalty program @airBaltic Club is in the process of fully integrating the PINS program under one brand, therefore providing even more attractive offers to the customers and focusing on more travel-related partners and airline related rewards. https://t.co/dE5sq26TIo https://t.co/4iAY4J8oiu

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
airBaltic and @Airbus have signed an agreement on a revised A220-300 delivery schedule for the remaining 28 jets @airBaltic has on order. It will complete the firm order of 50 Airbus A220-300 jets by early 2024. 
✈️ Read more: https://t.co/F9QSjJxLkL https://t.co/mJ5D692MyD

Septembrī sadarbībā ar PIKC Liepājas Valsts tehnikumu uzsāksim jaunu programmu, kurā topošie gaisa kuģu mehāniķi varēs iegūt praktiskas zināšanas, strādājot @airBaltic Training autorizētajā @DiamondAircraft apkopes centrā  starptautiskajā lidostā Liepāja. https://t.co/uLSSv5dFDf https://t.co/708FfZZerY

All airBaltic flights are now operated with the new Airbus A220-300 aircraft. ✈️
#DidYouKnow that our average fleet age is only 2 years and 2 months? This makes airBaltic fleet one of the youngest in the Europe!

📸 by David Tomáško https://t.co/6aJNCGW4oZ

In July, the second full month since we resumed our operations, we've carried 151 529 or 251% more passengers than during June. We are pleased that @airBaltic has maintained connectivity in all Baltic countries by resuming flights more destinations. https://t.co/V0aPHATYod https://t.co/QnbucXKbmw

Good morning Monday! ☀️
Quiz has concluded and exactly half of you got the right answer - the song performed by Latvian band Instrumenti, Lithuanian singer Jazzu and Estonian artist Ewert Sundja is called "Via Baltica"! 🎧
Listen it here: https://t.co/emVQ1cLENg https://t.co/EhPnnEnkgy

Bija patiess gods piedalīties Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku programmā! Kā Latvijas nacionālā lidsabiedrība pēdējos 25 gados esam spēlējuši būtisku lomu nozares attīstībā un, izveidojot Pilotu akadēmiju, ļaujam jauniem cilvēkiem Latvijā sasniegt sapni kļūt par pilotiem. https://t.co/gTVsCIiEtJ

Neilgi pirms plkst. 15.00 tiekamies Spilves lidlaukā, kur Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku ietvaros skatītājus priecēsim ar īpašu @Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnas zemo pārlidojumu! ✈️ https://t.co/lpA1Fyp9SE

Weekend is almost here which means #airBalticQuiz time again testing your knowledge!
Almost a year ago airBaltic together with artists from the Baltics created a unique song in celebration of the 30th anniversary of the Baltic Way! 🇪🇪🇱🇻🇱🇹
Do you remember the title of the song? 🎵

Additional flexibility to new reservations! When purchasing GREEN or GREEN plus tickets, add flight cancellation option to receive a full refund of your ticket in a form of @airBaltic gift card in case you wish to cancel your reservation. Read more: https://t.co/cn5dL73oW9 https://t.co/fQYYFJmRxV

Šo sestdien, 15. augustā, Spilves lidlaukā gaidāmo Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku programmas ietvaros Latvijas nacionālā lidsabiedrība @airBaltic piedalīsies ar īpašu @Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnas zemo pārlidojumu. https://t.co/MhkJqq6Cvz

entity.name: Live: The Masters PGA Tour Golf
entity.description: Golfing action from the PGA Tour.

data.text: #DidYouKnow that the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft is whopping 38.7 metres? 📏 That's exactly 10 metres longer than the size of the basketball court! 🏀 https://t.co/ySAAfmaGLw

domain.name: Sport
domain.description: Types of sports, like soccer and basketball

data.text: Starting on August 11, @airBaltic will resume direct flights between Riga and Budapest (Hungary). The flights will be performed two times a week on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. Read more: https://t.co/rOW0wXnWet https://t.co/i15wMP5EWb

Watch @airBaltic @Airbus A220-300 landing in one of the world's most popular tourist destinations - Rhodes. The Greek island is famous for its historical attractions, beautiful beaches, and unique flora and fauna. https://t.co/vLJaF2PogO

data.text: As our customer service is currently receiving increased amount of calls and messages due to flight changes, your request may be processed with a longer waiting time. We thank for your patience and understanding. https://t.co/fmRwOjqtUT

If you can’t decide where to fly next, make sure to check out the list of safest choice destinations in our website, where we have compiled places less affected by the virus at the moment: https://t.co/SSlcEwKMMS https://t.co/p0YkiZgIMI
Thanks to all #airBalticQuiz participants! Almost half of you were correct - the official end date of this year's aviation summer season is October 24! https://t.co/WtYSlhfow8 https://t.co/5FmLix07R0
Good morning, Friday! #airBalticQuiz calling!☺️Summer is slowly coming to an end, however not in the aviation calendar! Do you know the official end date of this year's aviation summer season?📅

#DidYouKnow that airBaltic Call Centre agents speak and answer our passengers in 7 languages - Latvian, Lithuanian, Estonian, English, German, Finnish and Russian. Every day our Reservations department team are there to take your call and provide with assistance when needed! https://t.co/3rp76lbT9O

To provide flexibility to our passengers, whose flights have been cancelled less than 14 days before departure due to the changing travel restrictions, we've introduced a new temporary policy that allows to change the planned destination. Read more: https://t.co/WNaAqq6oPX https://t.co/xp3YDXhR2X

More flights to sunny Greece! We are happy to announce new route from Riga to Thessaloniki starting to operate on September 4, 2020. airBaltic will also increase flight frequency on Athens route and will start operating flights to Rhodes later this week: https://t.co/MfH0ec67DM https://t.co/HPpYPvOeyL

Thanks to everyone who participated in this week's quiz! Almost 80% got the right answer - we announced a new direct route from Riga to Rhodes (Greece)! 🇬🇷
Flights are starting on August 6, 2020! See you on board! ✈️ https://t.co/rEj2n24UWL

Either you're waiting to greet your loved ones at the airport or checking your own upcoming flight status, the exact arrival and departure times for all @airBaltic flights are always available on our flight status page 👉https://t.co/Gil8O2pPx6 https://t.co/OJJuMwm0k0

data.text:
Hello Friday! #airBalticQuiz is again here wondering whether you know all things airBaltic! 🤓
This time, can you name our newest destination which we announced to our network this week? We can give you a hint - it's a sunny one! 🏝

#DidYouKnow that airBaltic employs more than 100 aircraft mechanics and technicians, who work in shifts to make sure that every airplane is properly serviced and safe to fly. Even so, they have to be ready to work on call 24/7, including on weekends and holidays. https://t.co/M6hdlYdiIv

More sunny options for your summer getaway! We are excited to announce new direct seasonal route from Riga to Rhodes (Greece) starting to operate on August 6, 2020. The new flights will be performed two times weekly: https://t.co/KyaSySX5uE https://t.co/Aq1Nko0eq0
A unique glimpse inside heavy rains 🌦 Photo by 📸 Jelena Petrova-Brandt https://t.co/oHZkfczpNk

Thank you for participating! 58% got the right answer! https://t.co/9pIomgZvJ1
We wish you a pleasant and sunny week! ☀️

Friday and #airBalticQuiz time! This week we informed you about the proportion of people purchasing their flight tickets on our webpage! 🎟 Do you remember how many of those percentage wise were on mobile? 📱

We're proud that @airBaltic Pilot Academy has managed to gain significant track record and continue its expansion. Last week airBaltic Training accepted already its eighth @DiamondAircraft training aircraft. Read more ✈️  https://t.co/PbadKo3a41 https://t.co/5iKitZt4zx

Last week, the proportion of people purchasing their flight tickets on @airBaltic website from mobile devices reached 33%. Overall, close to 50 000 new reservations or 9% more than the week before were made. Read more: https://t.co/wKKPcJEOe1 https://t.co/mdmPWjR1l2

airBaltic Training has received certification to establish an Authorized Service Centre for @DiamondAircraft in Liepaja International Airport. This fleet is one of the success factors for our Pilot Academy - the go-to program for aspiring Baltic pilots: https://t.co/wU1JSyaWHU https://t.co/wgLBLbLDY7

Thanks to everyone who participated! There are 145 seats in the aircraft and almost half of you got it right! More interesting details about our Airbus A220-300 you may find here: https://t.co/SHfSMYWRjl
Have a wonderful week! ☀️ https://t.co/orAAxKFKSX

Our @Airbus A220-300 environmental control system is made to deliver the best cabin air quality. Watch the video about technology behind HEPA filter in an exclusive video by @Air_Clips and learn more about our current operations in the full movie here: https://t.co/fEw0xcpO7o https://t.co/wW1vBiU7Zb

It's #airBalticQuiz time! 👋 
Few weeks ago we were wondering whether you know the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft. How many of you know how many seats are in this aircraft? ✈️💺

If communication is your strong point and you speak Estonian or Finnish fluently, join airBaltic Call centre team! If you feel that it might be the right place for you, apply for Sales and Service Advisor vacancies here 👉 https://t.co/oWaVRMY6vd https://t.co/cUtsOJOEdL

We are happy to see that demand for traveling is returning! June was the first full month since @airBaltic resumed operations, and during one month we've carried 60 409 passengers and operated 1 091 flights. Read more: https://t.co/QIPbWo1Y0E https://t.co/VKHW29ht3m
RT @Gaussm: Today the final decision was made - the Latvian government will invest EUR 250 million into the equity of @airBaltic. The new e…

data.text: Thank you for voting! More than a half (55%) got the right answer - we have five destinations within the Baltic states: RIX, TLL, VNO, LPX and PLQ! We wish you a sunny week!☀️ https://t.co/J6DFufERxu

The weekend is almost here which means it's the time for the weekly #airBalticQuiz! This time we are wondering whether you know how many destinations airBaltic have within the Baltic states? 🇱🇻🇪🇪🇱🇹 Can you name them all?

On July 6, we performed the first flight on @airBaltic new Vilnius - Dubrovnik route. This region looks incredible from pretty much any angle, but this viewpoint will be a unique experience for most of you! Pay attention to the smooth landing of our @Airbus A220-300! ✈️ https://t.co/s4skCBzLlk

data.text: We are excited to announce our Summer 2021 network! We will offer 82 routes, which is 21% more compared to this year, including 15 seasonal destinations from Riga that in 2020 were postponed due to COVID-19 outbreak. Read more: https://t.co/U7NuSHUflJ https://t.co/epdqj8B70J

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Thank you for voting! Almost all of you answered correct - the new name of our Economy class ticket types is GREEN! 💚
We wish you a pleasant evening! 👋
https://t.co/s9aDVv9KKj

The @EU_Commission on July 3, 2020, under EU State aid rules, has approved the Latvian government's investment of €250 million into the equity of the @airBaltic to contribute to overcome the economic crisis caused by COVID-19 and resume growth. Read more: https://t.co/hV8sK8gjJ0 https://t.co/HUP2WWurKA

domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: Saskaņā ar ES valsts atbalsta noteikumiem, @EU_Commission 3. jūlijā apstiprinājusi Latvijas valdības investīcijas 250 miljonu eiro apmērā @airBaltic kapitālā, lai palīdzētu pārvarēt Covid-19 izraisīto ekonomisko krīzi un atjaunot izaugsmi. https://t.co/kclb3tCWVK

How does international traveling feel post-lockdown for passengers? And how do pilots work during these times? Get a unique insight in the current life of airBaltic by subscribing to a video premiere by https://t.co/I8YdzSWkCz here 👉https://t.co/nLEVVzRzTJ https://t.co/72K8CxM4da

It's another Friday with #airBalticQuiz! If you are following us closely, you should be able to answer this week's question very easily! Do you know the new name of our revised and improved airBaltic ticket types? 🎫

We are excited to expand our route map, offering new flights from all Baltic capitals! This week we launched long awaited Vilnius – London route, offering three weekly flights to our passengers. Looking forward greeting you on board! ✈️ https://t.co/lKaDod4riu

As of July 1, @airBaltic introduces revised ticket types with extra flexibility for its flights: GREEN, GREEN plus, GREEN classic, and BUSINESS. Take a good look at the services each ticket type includes and find the best fit for your travel habits: https://t.co/8746ra70vS https://t.co/QJ6i1mgpKE

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic  plans to resume direct flights from Riga to London on July 1 and from Tallinn to London on July 4. In addition, new direct flights from Vilnius to London on July 1 will be launched. https://t.co/ySeticYPRS

Thanks for all your answers! Almost 3/4 of you got the right answer - the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft is 38.7 metres! Even more technical geeky details 🔧 about the plane you may find on this page: https://t.co/SHfSMYWRjl 
Have a sunny Sunday! ☀️ https://t.co/f2cxtjpBXz
